title: How to change a human mind without technology - Quora

response.answer_text: 1)Obviously you can not change human mind by means of any TECHNOLOGY, so far available. 2)In case of BRAIN as well you do not have TRANSPLANTATION REMEDIES. 3)In case of MIND you can at the most CONDITION - DECONDITION, ORIENT - REORIENT the Mentality of a person by means Interpersonal approaches like DIALOGUE etc,that too TENTATIVELY and not permenently. 4)Those who talk about RADICAL CHANGE of MIND, TRANSMUTATION of MIND, TRANSFORMATION of MIND, TRANCE-MIGRATION of MIND, ABSOLUTE CONTROL of the MIND are evolved into the ADVERTISING PROPAGANDA of SOME POWER GAME MYTHOLOGY. Ashok Nanotkar. India.
